message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Fair is fair.
I think I deserve a bit more, don't you?
I'm willing to give you a little more, Bob, but I'm not giving in to your demands. Let's find a compromise.
Come on Alice, I'm starting to lose money here. Meet me in the middle... of my side.
Bob, we're both losing money with each round. Let's end this now. I'm willing to give you 40, but I'm not going any lower.
